creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
description: shallow round plate with scene of flying teal goose, and two standing geese, one blue, one plum colored; tall green reeds at L of scene; red circle with scrollwork design around outer basin; underside of plate decorated with teal and red arrows; scalloped rim painted brown; natural wood box with lid, yellow and white cloth wrap, and navy blue box tie
inscription: lid verso: 古九谷　中皿; lid recto: 古九谷  凡そ二百八十年以前の作
markings: teal and black maker\'s mark at BC of plate: 福
title: Kokutani small dish with three geese
